current hero.hero power: Can attack any enemy with 2 manas and do a one-hp harm to them.
current hero.special power: Spells are worth 2 manas less than for other heroes.

heroes.hero power: Can attack any enemy with 2 manas and do a one-hp harm to them.
heroes.special power: Spells are worth 2 manas less than for other heroes.

heroes.hero power: Steal a card from enemies hand for 3 manas.
heroes.special power: Cards of other heroes type are worth 2 manas less than for other heroes.
